korean: 명품 매장을 지나가는데 가격표를 보고 한숨이 나왔어.
가방 하나가 몇백만 원이라니 상상도 안 돼.
결국 화장품 코너에서 작은 거 하나만 샀다.
립스틱 하나 사는데도 포장을 정말 예쁘게 해줬어.
가끔 이렇게 구경 오는 것도 나쁘지 않은 것 같아.
그때는 좀 더 제대로 쇼핑할 수 있을 것 같아.
english: I went to the department store after a long time and looked around.
There were quite a lot of people since it was the weekend.
I sighed when I saw the price tags as I passed by the luxury brand stores.
I can't even imagine a bag costing several million won.
I just looked around and left.
But it was actually fun just window shopping.
In the end, I only bought something small at the cosmetics section.
Even though I just bought one lipstick, they wrapped it really nicely.
The department store staff's service is honestly on another level.
Still, the department store atmosphere was pretty nice.
It's clean and comfortable, so it's the best for browsing.
I think coming to look around like this sometimes isn't bad.
Next time I should come during a sale period.
Then I'll be able to actually shop properly.
